body:
Comment 1: 
It's equivalent to x = x op y as long as you
think of x and y as bound variables instead
as a purely lexical substitution.  Since the
former is a much more common usage and the
latter is arguably just a bug in the C preprocessor
model, I don't think a fix is necessary here.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WontFix**._
